overview:
Welcome to Prestige Walking Sticks – expert craftsmen in all types of walking sticks.

From our home in Northern Ireland we offer exceptional quality handmade walking canes crafted form a wide variety of woods and materials. From oak and ash to holly and our own famous blackthorn walking sticks, we provide a large selection of walking sticks to the UK and beyond, and suitable for many different uses.

Browse through our gallery of walking sticks and you’ll see the high standards adhered to with every one of our walking canes, whether you’re looking for thumb-stick, hiking sticks or shepherd’s crook walking sticks, the UK’s long history of walking canes is reflected right here.
